text:
Hi <@U080BK2EHPE>
Yes, definitely doable

• Use webhook in the workflow to get the contact details, once you have to you can get the company information using HubSpot API
• Use that company name to call any API you want
• It’s JS so you can definitely extract the information you want from response
• Use API to enter the processed information to HubSpot again

<@U01BJF5QAKA> Thank you for the detailed answer. Can I ask additional questions?
When using a serverless function, do I have to use a private app to access HubSpot portal data?
Is it essential to use a private app to implement what I mentioned above?
<@U080BK2EHPE> Yes, you need to create a Private app which should be very straight forward and permissions are also not very complex unlike complex AWS permission sets
<@U01BJF5QAKA> Thank you so much for your kind explanation. If I come across something I'm not sure about in the future, is it okay if I send you a DM?
